Classes/BasicAuthenticationToken.html.abstract: A basic authentication token. Used for authenticating requests with a user name and password per HTTP basic authorization.

Classes/OAuthToken.html.name: OAuthToken
Classes/OAuthToken.html.abstract: A token for use with an OAuth service. Only handles access tokens - subclassing is necessary for other (refresh) token types.
